title: La Cité
description: I studied at La Cité in computer programming.
I learned about programming languages such as Java, C#, and Javascript.
I also learned about web development, Databases, and project management.

title: IGA - services
description: I worked at IGA Extra des Grives as a cashier and a customer service representative.
I was responsible for cashing out customers, answering their questions and helping them find products.
I also had to keep the store clean and organized.

title: Accountant Assistance
description: I worked for a day as an assistant to an accounter at Exo Construction.
I was responsible for helping her with the paperwork and organizing the files.
It was also the first time I'd had to make and send an invoice to someone.
